name: Static Analysis

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  coverity:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: Run Coverity
        run: |
          ./coverity.sh

  misra:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: MISRA C Check
        run: |
          ./check_misra.sh
